_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The seven planes of consciousness [an7.4: The first plane of consciousness - sentient beings that are diverse in body and diverse in perception
The second plane of consciousness - sentient beings that are diverse in body and unified in perception
The third plane of consciousness - sentient beings that are unified in body and diverse in perception
The fourth plane of consciousness - sentient beings that are unified in body and unified in perception
The fifth plane of consciousness - sentient beings that have gone totally beyond perceptions of form
The sixth plane of consciousness - sentient beings that have gone totally beyond the dimension of infinite space
The seventh plane of consciousness - sentient beings that have gone totally beyond the dimension of infinite consciousness
